content: If it gets that dumb bastard out of Kansas, AWESOME!!! The Romans shall have my pity. Of course, for someone who is sooo dedicated to the people of Kansas, like Pompeo, he sure is quick to leave them behind with all his baggage. Despite the fact that people around the country would tell Brownback that his tax plan was a failure, he continued to praise himself on how well it is was working. He’s a perfect little Trump Mini-Me. Bye bye Little Cheeto! You won’t be missed.
